content.text:
# Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actor – Kannada

| website = [http://filmfareawards.indiatimes.com/ Filmfare Awards]
}}
The Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actor – Kannada is given by Filmfare as part of its annual Filmfare Awards South for Kannada films. The award is given by the chosen jury of critics assigned.
